name: theropod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of dinosaur that walked on its back legs and had short front legs: Theropods and birds share many anatomical features. Theropod dinosaurs include meat-eaters like Tyrannosaurus rex.
More examplesFewer examplesTheropods usually had teeth in the front jaws.The theropods were carnivores with a lightweight skeleton.The footprint shape and narrowness of the tracks clearly indicated this was a theropod dinosaur.
